nio/MergeStreams.description: The MergeStreams block takes signals from *input_1* and *input_2* and emits them as one signal.  If the signals have matching attributes (that aren't the group_by property) then the input_2 signal's attribute will take priority.

backup_interval.title: Backup Interval
backup_interval.description: An interval of time that specifies how often persisted data is saved.

expiration.title: Stream Expiration
expiration.description: Length of time to store an incoming signal and wait for an incoming signal to the other input before dropping the signal.

group_by.title: Group By
group_by.description: Signals from the two inputs are merged based on matching group attributes.

load_from_persistence.title: Load from Persistence?
load_from_persistence.description: If `True`, the blockâ€™s state will be saved when the block is stopped, and reloaded once the block is restarted.

notify_once.title: Notify Once?
notify_once.description: If true (checked), remove a signal from block after it is merged and emitted.

default.description: A new signal that is the merged version of one signal from input_1 and one signal from input_2.

groups.description: Display all the current groupings of the signals.
